misc: Loves basketball even more than Marcus, making some fans wonder if he's a real golfer
biography: Pasi, affectionately known as "Susi-Pasi," is a formidable competitor hailing from Vuosaari Golf Helsinki. His dedication to the sport is evident, even if some fans playfully question his true golfing allegiance given his even greater passion for basketball; it is rumored that he loves basketball even more than Marcus.

With three past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Pasi is a familiar face at the event. He has secured one victory at the Hector Trophée. He is yet to claim the Victor Trophy, the individual title awarded to the best player.

With Hector Trophée 2025 marking Pasi's fourth appearance, anticipation is building to see if he can leverage his experience to achieve further success. His presence guarantees spirited competition, and his fans eagerly await his performance.
